About universAAL Samples Suite

A set of components that use the universAAL middleware with different roles and serve as samples.

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
universAAL Samples Context bus tester Context bus tester
universAAL Samples Context bus tester for Android A set of components that use the universAAL middleware with different roles and serve as samples.
universAAL Samples Service bus tester A set of components that use the universAAL middleware with different roles and serve as samples.
universAAL Samples Service bus Test Server A set of components that use the universAAL middleware with different roles and serve as samples.
universAAL Samples UI bus tester A set of components that use the universAAL middleware with different roles and serve as samples.
universAAL Samples Lighting Server (OSGi) A server based on the domain ontology of lighting services
universAAL Samples Lighting Client (OSGi) A client using lighting services based on the corresponding domain ontology
universAAL Samples Lighting UI Client A client using lighting services based on the corresponding domain ontology and interaction based on the dialog package
universAAL Samples Ontology Tutorial Example This example shows how to convert an ontology concept into its java representation for uAAL
universAAL Samples Simple UI A set of components that use the universAAL middleware with different roles and serve as samples.
universAAL Samples Sensor Simulator GUI Context Event publisher with Swing GUI for simulating sensors. Simulates user location sensor, temperature and humidity sensors and lighting controller
universAAL Samples Activity Hub Client This is a client app listening on the uAAL context bus for events based on the activity hub ontology (ISO 11073-10471) and invoking services related to activity hub sensors on the service bus.
universAAL Samples LDDI Simulator of ActivityHub events (ISO 11073-10471) Simulator of events coming from ActivityHub Sensors (ISO 11073-10471); The events are sent to the universAAL context bus using the ActivityHub Ontology.
universAAL Samples Device Client This is a client app listening on the uAAL context bus for events based on the device ontology and invoking device services on the service bus.
universAAL Samples Middleware Broker Client Simple broker acting as a client
universAAL Samples Middleware Deploy Client Request the installation of an artefact on
universAAL Samples Utilities Example Server An example of how to use the utilities bundles
universAAL Samples Utilities Example Client An example of how to use the utilities bundles
universAAL Samples Utilities Example App An example of how to use the utilities bundles
universAAL Samples Utilities Example Mini-App An example of how to use the utilities bundle simplest level
universAAL Samples Middleware Karaf Feature Lighting A set of components that use the universAAL middleware with different roles and serve as samples.
universAAL Samples Middleware Karaf Feature Ping-Pong A set of components that use the universAAL middleware with different roles and serve as samples.
universAAL Samples AAPI Simplified Lighting Ontology The simpligied ontology defining URIs for the most general concepts dealing with light sources and their control.
universAAL Samples AAPI Regular Lighting Server Regular Lighting Server for tests with Simplified API
universAAL Samples AAPI Regular Lighting Client Regular Lighting Client for tests with Simplified API
universAAL Samples AAPI Lighting Server Simplified A server based on the domain ontology of lighting services
universAAL Samples AAPI Lighting Client Simplified A client using simple api lighting services based on the corresponding domain ontology
universAAL Samples Context Situation Reasoner Test Client A client for testing the universAAL reasoner
universAAL Samples Configurable Module A set of components that use the universAAL middleware with different roles and serve as samples.
universAAL Samples LDDI Weighing scale agent publisher Continua Health Alliance agent event publisher
universAAL Samples LDDI Continua Manager Client (unix OS version) Continua Health Alliance agent event publisher
universAAL Samples LDDI Continua Manager Client (windows OS version) Continua Health Alliance agent event publisher
universAAL Tutorials Suite A set of small tutorials showing the use of specific parts of the platform.
